name: Hotrod Red
description:
A small prototype game made as part of my fifth Game-A-Week for my unit on rapid game prototyping at University.

--------Controls---------

Click on the objects next to the bike to start the minigames (petrol, air canister & spanner) 

Once you have completed all the minigames (or not) press the play button to send the bike flying!

Petrol can minigame: Spam left click on the mouse

Air canister minigame: Scroll the mouse wheel up as fast as you can *note that you can scroll down which will reduce the value*

Spanner minigame: click left and right mouse buttons on after the other as fast as you can
